short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This companion extension for MonAmi Note Cloud - a markdown note-taking app - allows quick note writing when browsing web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an companion extension for MonAmi Note Cloud, a note-taking app.

This extension features:
- write notes on a side window, with title and URL automatically filled
- quickly save text selection of web page as a note
- upload notes to cloud

To run Cloud app: click cloud icon from extension popup window. 
Or directly go to https://simbust-monami.web.app/ 

Cloud app features:
- notes are stored on cloud, accessible from any browser or computer
- run on Android/iOS devices without downloading app; just access from mobile browser and make it an app (PWA)
- standard Markdown-based open format
- supports tags, hierarchical folders and multiple books for robust organization
- familiar 3-pane look (folder tree - notes list - note content), similar to Windows Explorer or Mac Finder
- multiple edit modes (Markdown, WYSIWYG, side-by-side) for different work style
